source.name: ED Grants: School Improvement Grant (SIG)
source.description: The School Improvement Grant (SIG) program data depicts the location, award amount and type of model selected by States in awarding nearly $3.5 billion in School Improvement Grant funds in 2010 to turn around their persistently lowest achieving schools.
